name: part_006
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE】シャチ爆誕！初ゲストあり！【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [_rgeHcQu0Tc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Positive Parade' by HoloX members.
MC section where Sakamata Chloe thanks the guests and prepares for her next song.
Performance of 'Ai o komete hanataba o' by Sakamata Chloe.

subtitles.original: Hey! 笑顔、涙、流すじゃない？
subtitles.english: Hey! You shed smiles and tears, don't you?

subtitles.original: それで平気なフリは普通じゃない？
subtitles.english: Is pretending to be okay normal after that?

subtitles.original: Hey! 辛いことあるのに
subtitles.english: Hey! Even though there are painful things,

subtitles.original: 世界、こんなモヤモヤは特に関係ない
subtitles.english: The world doesn't really care about this haziness.

subtitles.original: 何時、溜息に溢れそう
subtitles.english: Always about to overflow with sighs.

subtitles.original: これも、もうダメ、助けて
subtitles.english: This is no good either, help me.

subtitles.original: そう、焦ることもない
subtitles.english: That's right, no need to rush.

subtitles.original: 聞けば、ほら大丈夫
subtitles.english: If you listen, see, it's okay.

subtitles.original: 甘えられない、頼っちゃえ
subtitles.english: Can't be coddled? Then just lean on me.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい夢、胸にギュッと詰めて
subtitles.english: Stuff the dreams you want to fulfill tightly into your heart.

subtitles.original: したいことばかりで、やってみせて
subtitles.english: Show me all the things you want to do.

subtitles.original: 僕ら止まれない、これは良い感じですか？
subtitles.english: We can't stop, does this feel good?

subtitles.original: やっぱりダメでしょう
subtitles.english: As I thought, it's no good.

subtitles.original: 終わらない夜は星取って照らそう
subtitles.english: Let's light up the endless night with stars.

subtitles.original: 繋いだ時も光はずっと側に
subtitles.english: Even when we're connected, the light is always by our side.

subtitles.original: 僕ら止まれない、君も大丈夫になる
subtitles.english: We can't stop, you'll be okay too.

subtitles.original: ぴったり笑顔になるから
subtitles.english: Because you'll have a perfect smile.

subtitles.original: もっともっと込めちゃって、いいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it okay to put more and more into it?

subtitles.original: 言いたい言葉、間違えないよ
subtitles.english: I won't mistake the words I want to say.

subtitles.original: 言い訳をします、僕はここにいます
subtitles.english: I'll make an excuse, I am here.

subtitles.original: 明日に凹まされるように、また笑い合えたら
subtitles.english: If we can laugh together again, after being flattened by tomorrow...

subtitles.original: 叶えたい夢、胸にギュッと詰めて
subtitles.english: Stuff the dreams you want to fulfill tightly into your heart.

subtitles.original: したいことばかりで、やってみせて
subtitles.english: Show me all the things you want to do.

subtitles.original: 僕ら止まれない、これは良い感じですか？
subtitles.english: We can't stop, does this feel good?

subtitles.original: やっぱりダメでしょう
subtitles.english: As I thought, it's no good.

subtitles.original: 終わらない夜は星取って照らそう
subtitles.english: Let's light up the endless night with stars.

subtitles.original: 繋いだ時も光はずっと側に
subtitles.english: Even when we're connected, the light is always by our side.

subtitles.original: 僕ら止まれない、君も大丈夫になる
subtitles.english: We can't stop, you'll be okay too.

subtitles.original: ぴったり笑顔になるから
subtitles.english: Because you'll have a perfect smile.

subtitles.original: 間違ってなんていないのに
subtitles.english: Even though I haven't done anything wrong,

subtitles.original: ほら、誰がなんて言おうなら
subtitles.english: Look, no matter what anyone says,

subtitles.original: 君を否定しちゃう全てを
subtitles.english: Everything that denies you,

subtitles.original: 放っておいたりしないから
subtitles.english: I won't just leave it be.

subtitles.original: 手締めてついででもいいから
subtitles.english: Even if it's just a byproduct of holding hands,

subtitles.original: ほら、上手く流してよ
subtitles.english: Look, just let it slide properly.

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしいって言うけれど
subtitles.english: You say it's embarrassing,

subtitles.original: それは僕も一緒なんだよ
subtitles.english: But it's the same for me too.

subtitles.original: 似合ってないとかは言わないよ
subtitles.english: I won't say it doesn't suit you.

subtitles.original: 君に会った事の答えだ
subtitles.english: It's the answer to having met you.

subtitles.original: 頼ってくれ
subtitles.english: Rely on me.

subtitles.original: 頼ってくれ
subtitles.english: Rely on me.

subtitles.original: と
subtitles.english: And...

subtitles.original: 叶えたい夢、胸にギュッと詰めて
subtitles.english: Stuff the dreams you want to fulfill tightly into your heart.

subtitles.original: したいことばかりで、やってみせて
subtitles.english: Show me all the things you want to do.

subtitles.original: 僕ら止まれない、これは良い感じですか？
subtitles.english: We can't stop, does this feel good?

subtitles.original: やっぱりダメでしょう
subtitles.english: As I thought, it's no good.

subtitles.original: 終わらない夜は星取って照らそう
subtitles.english: Let's light up the endless night with stars.

subtitles.original: 繋いだ時も光はずっと側に
subtitles.english: Even when we're connected, the light is always by our side.

subtitles.original: 僕ら止まれない、君も大丈夫になる
subtitles.english: We can't stop, you'll be okay too.

subtitles.original: ぴったり笑顔になるから
subtitles.english: Because you'll have a perfect smile.

subtitles.original: 僕ら止まれない
subtitles.english: We can't stop.

subtitles.original: 君も大丈夫になる、ぴったり笑顔になるから
subtitles.english: You'll be okay too, because you'll have a perfect smile.

subtitles.original: どうだった？
subtitles.english: How was that?

subtitles.original: ちょっと沙花叉初のゲストということで
subtitles.english: Since it's Sakamata's first time having guests...

subtitles.original: ホロXに来てもらいました！ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: I had HoloX come over! Thank you all so much!

subtitles.original: ちょっとめちゃめちゃ可愛くみんなでね
subtitles.english: Everyone looked super cute,

subtitles.original: そしてあの、なんか意味を持たせてできたんじゃないかなと思うので
subtitles.english: and I think we were able to perform with a certain meaning behind it,

subtitles.original: またこれも今度お話しさせてください
subtitles.english: so let me talk more about that another time.

subtitles.original: で、普段ね、応援してくれてる飼育員さんにもちょっと感謝の気持ちを伝えたいなと思って
subtitles.english: And, I wanted to express my gratitude to the Breeders who always support me,

subtitles.original: 感謝といえばこれですよね！
subtitles.english: and when you think of gratitude, it's gotta be this!

subtitles.original: じゃーん！花束！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! A bouquet!

subtitles.original: これ、何だか分かりますかね？
subtitles.english: Do you know what this is for?

subtitles.original: ちょっと浮かばない？とある曲が...
subtitles.english: Doesn't it ring a bell? A certain song...

subtitles.original: そしてゴンドラがここにあるというね
subtitles.english: And there's even a gondola here.

subtitles.original: はい、いきたいと思います。
subtitles.english: Alright, here we go.

subtitles.original: 愛をこめて花束を！
subtitles.english: A bouquet with love!

subtitles.original:
愛をこめて花束を
作詞:多保孝一・いしわたり淳治・越智志帆 / 作曲:多保孝一 / 編曲:蔦谷好位置
subtitles.english:
A Bouquet with Love
Lyrics: Koichi Tabo, Junji Ishiwatari, Shiho Ochi / Composition: Koichi Tabo / Arrangement: Koichi Tsutaya

subtitles.original: 二人で写真を撮ろう
subtitles.english: Let's take a photo together

subtitles.original: 懐かしいこの景色と
subtitles.english: With this nostalgic scenery

subtitles.original: あの人と同じポーズで
subtitles.english: In the same pose as that person

subtitles.original: おどけて見せてほしい
subtitles.english: I want you to show me a playful look

subtitles.original: 見上げる空の青さ
subtitles.english: The blueness of the sky we look up at

subtitles.original: 気まぐれに雲は流れて
subtitles.english: Clouds flow capriciously

subtitles.original: 綺麗なものは遠くに
subtitles.english: Beautiful things are far away

subtitles.original: あるから綺麗なの
subtitles.english: And that's why they're beautiful

subtitles.original: 約束した通りに
subtitles.english: Just as we promised
